article_metadata.description: David Denby on the three facial expressions of Donald Trump, whose persona reflects those of gangsters, wrestlers, and parts of the Republican base.

og.description: Trump has only three expressions because life, for him, is quite simple.
og.title: The Three Faces of Trump - The New Yorker
